title: Film appreciation: language of the film
creator_credit: Bruce Baker, Simon Scanlon, Karl Holtsnider and OFM Productions
brief_description: Uses examples of different types of lighting, camera angles and movements to demonstrate the effects of various filming techniques on the viewer. Featuring Ann Blyth.
